title: Incorrect 'Build' action enablement in Java perspective popup menu
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: Currently, the 'Build' action is always enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective, regardless of the user's preference settings.
EB: The 'Build' action should only be enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective if the user has not selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences -> Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open Eclipse IDE and switch to the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Observe the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective - 'Build' action should still be enabled.
